Package Brick.Break.Brick

Class BrickController

java.lang.Object
Brick.Break.Brick.BrickController
Direct Known Subclasses:
CementBrickController, ClayBrickController, GoldBrickController, SteelBrickController
public abstract class BrickController
extends java.lang.Object
This is the Controller of Model class(Brick Class) in Brick MVC design pattern This is an abstract class.

  • Constructor Details

    • BrickController

      public BrickController​(Brick brickModel)
      This is the constructor of "BrickController" class. This constructor will set the default value for the data in model class(Brick class) once it is called by another class.
      Parameters:
      brickModel - This parameter is the object of model class(Brick class).

  • Method Details

    • setImpact

      public boolean setImpact​(java.awt.geom.Point2D point, int dir)
      This method is to see if the brick have impact from the ball or not, if had, the brick strength will deduct by 1.
      Returns:
      either "true" or "false"

    • makeBrickFace

      protected abstract java.awt.Shape makeBrickFace​(java.awt.Point pos, java.awt.Dimension size)
      This is an abstract method which is used to create bricks. This method will be implemented by the child classes.
      Parameters:
      pos - This parameter is the position of the brick.
      size - This parameter is the size of the brick.

    • getBrick

      public abstract java.awt.Shape getBrick()
      This is an abstract method which is used to get the bricks. This method will be implemented by the child classes.

    • findImpact

      public final int findImpact​(BallController b)
      This method is to determined which position of the brick did the ball hit.
      Parameters:
      b - This parameter is the object of the "BallController" class.
      Returns:
      either "100", "200", "300" or "400"

    • isBroken

      public final boolean isBroken()
      This method is to determined if the bricks are broken.
      Returns:
      "true"

    • repair

      public void repair()
      This method is to repair the broken bricks.

    • impact

      public void impact()
      This method is used to give impact to the brick. Once the brick have impact, the brick's brick strength will either be deducted by 1 or the brick will straightaway break.

    • renderBrick

      public void renderBrick​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
      This method get the "drawBrick" method from "BrickView" class and draw out the bricks to the screen.

    • getBRICKFace

      public java.awt.Shape getBRICKFace()
      This is a getter method which get the face of brick from the model class(Brick class).
      Returns:
      "brickFace" from model class (Brick class)

    • getINNERColour

      public java.awt.Color getINNERColour()
      This is a getter method which get the inner colour of the brick from the model class(Brick class).
      Returns:
      "Color inner colour" from model class (Brick class)

    • getBORDERColour

      public java.awt.Color getBORDERColour()
      This is a getter method which get the border colour of the brick from the model class(Brick class).
      Returns:
      "Color border colour" from model class (Brick class)

    • getImpactUp

      public static int getImpactUp()
      This is a getter method which get the up impact value on the brick from the model class(Brick class).
      Returns:
      "100" from model class (Brick class)

    • getImpactDown

      public static int getImpactDown()
      This is a getter method which get the down impact value on the brick from the model class(Brick class).
      Returns:
      "200" from model class (Brick class)

    • getImpactRight

      public static int getImpactRight()
      This is a getter method which get the right impact value on the brick from the model class(Brick class).
      Returns:
      "400" from model class (Brick class)

    • getImpactLeft

      public static int getImpactLeft()
      This is a getter method which get the left impact value on the brick from the model class(Brick class).
      Returns:
      "300" from model class (Brick class)

    • setBROKEN

      public void setBROKEN​(boolean broken)
      This method is to set if the bricks is broken or not.
      Parameters:
      broken - This parameter is to determined whether the brick is broken or not.

    • getSTRENGTH

      public int getSTRENGTH()
      This is a getter method which get the strength of the brick from the model class(Brick class)
